price: pero nadie, salvo Dios, tiene conocimiento de cuándo ocurrirá.
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: laysa lahā min dūni al-lahi kāshifatun
